entry.title: $2409 // Full Amenity Doorman Studio
entry.content:
Apartment Features
White oak floors; floor-to-ceiling windows; Chef Kitchens; Stainless steel appliances and quartz kitchen countertops with a waterfall edge, dishwasher

Building Amenities
Common outdoor space; Common work space; Pet grooming space; Resident lounge spaces for entertaining; Enclosed glass lobby pavilion; Bike room; Garage Parking; Laundry in Building; Live-in Super; Media Room; Package Room; Parking; Parking Available; Virtual Doorman; Smoke-free; Community Recreation Facilities

*Price listed is net effective
Heat, Hot Water, Cooking Gas included in rent

I specialize in No Fee luxury buildings. End your search by contacting me and allowing me to show you the best available apartments for your personal criteria. All at no cost to you.
